tool_description: This endpoints gets the lowest price and the highest price of a particular item on Jumia
name: Jumia Price Range
title: Jumia Price Range

api_list.name: Jumia Price Range
api_list.description: This endpoints gets the lowest price and the highest price of a particular item on Jumia
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jumia-price-range.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/price_range/jumia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jumia-price-range.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
